text: Björn Waldegård (12 November 1943 - 29 August 2014) was a Swedish rally driver who won the inaugural World Rally Championship for drivers in 1979. His Swedish nickname was "Walle". Waldegård died in Stockholm, Sweden from cancer, aged 70. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swedish racecar drivers
title: Björn Waldegård
